segments.text: Have you washed any clothes yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I've only washed my whites .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When you wash your dark clothes , can you put some of mine in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Is there any extra care that I should take with your clothes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just make sure you keep it on the gentle cycle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many clothes of yours do you want me to wash ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There isn't a lot , why , do you have a large load to wash ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's really only a small load .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mind washing my clothes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . It's no problem .
segments.speaker: S2
